Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurring after 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' appears at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' that are not followed by any reviewer response (e.g., not followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', or 'SW-Reviewer No Response')
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' compared to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' that eventually lead to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' in variants that include multiple reviewer assignment attempts (e.g., repeated 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurrences that happen after a deadline-related activity such as 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' or 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' per case, averaged across all cases
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' that precede a change in editor (e.g., followed by 'Assign a Different Editor' or 'Unassign Editor')
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' that occur more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' relative to the total number of reviewer-related activities (e.g., sum of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable', 'SW-Reviewer No Response')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' directly leads to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' within 7 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' in cases that result in 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' versus those that result in 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
